member.name: P:Dynamicweb.DataIntegration.Providers.UserProvider.UserDestinationWriter.ColumnNameForSearchingUsers
member.summary: Returns the column name from AccessUser table for seraching existing users. If no column selected in UserKey Filed, AccessUserUserName is used

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.DataIntegration.Providers.UserProvider.UserDestinationWriter.UpdateUserAddressesBeforeMoveToMainTable(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction,Dynamicweb.DataIntegration.Integration.Mapping)
member.summary: Updates UserID in UserAddress DataTable with founded UserId in AccessUser table. Should be executed before MoveDataToMainTable, afer Users import

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.DataIntegration.Providers.UserProvider.UserDestinationWriter.UpdateUserSecondaryRelationBeforeMoveToMainTable(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction,Dynamicweb.DataIntegration.Integration.Mapping)
member.summary: Updates UserID in AccessUserSecondaryRelation DataTable with founded UserId in AccessUser table. Should be executed before MoveDataToMainTable, afer Users import
